attributes.action: kincora to be included in the wesminister historical abuse inquiry
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to try and help those who were so wronged in the Kincora boys home get some justice. We are asking that the British gov include Kincora in the Westminister historical abuse inquiry. These kids were abused by people all over the UK some in positons of influence. Time those who covered it up and enabled it to take place are held to account.
